entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:19 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:19 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers late in the evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:19 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
